story.title: Eyes
story.content: Aquarius love to look into people's eyes, it's their way of looking into their soul.

story.title: Possess
story.content: Aquarius has the calmest exterior but darkest interior.

story.title: Weird
story.content: They would rather be weird than to be an exact duplicate of someone else.

story.title: Attracted
story.content: Aquarius is attracted to the unusual and out of the ordinary.

story.title: Strength
story.content: Progressive, Original, Independent, Humanitarian.

story.title: Weakness
story.content: Runs from emotional expression, Temperamental, Uncompromising, Aloof.

story.title: Likes
story.content: Fun with friends, Helping others, Fighting for causes, Intellectual conversation, A good listener.

story.title: Dislikes
story.content: Limitations, Broken promises, Being lonely, Dull or boring situations, People who disagree with them.

story.title: Mission
story.content: To know the truth. To use this knowledge to improve individual freedoms for the future progress of humanity.

story.title: Truth
story.content: What you really want to get at is the truth, the whole truth and nothing but the truth.

story.title: Wind
story.content: You can blow hot and cold, but, like the wind, you like to be free.

story.title: Conform
story.content: Uranus is an odd planet, it doesn't conform, and nor do you.

story.title: Communicative
story.content: Although Aquarius-born are communicative, they need time to get close to people.

story.title: Sensitive
story.content: Considering that they are highly sensitive people, closeness to them means vulnerability.

story.title: Immediacy
story.content: Their immediacy behaviour combined with their strong views, makes them a challenge to meet.

story.title: Compatibility
story.content: Gemini, Libra.

story.title: Aphrodisiac
story.content: Intellectual stimulation is by far the greatest aphrodisiac for Aquarius.

story.title: Attract
story.content: There's nothing that can attract an Aquarius more than an interesting conversation with a person.

story.title: Perspective
story.content: Openness, communication, imagination and willingness to risk are the qualities that fit well in the perspective of life of this zodiac sign.

story.title: Compatibility
story.content: Leo

story.title: Learn
story.content: To believe in miracles.

story.title: Realise
story.content: What you need to realise is there is also such a thing as emotional intelligence.

story.title: Acknowledge
story.content: Acknowledge that mystical and spiritual subjects can also be scientific.

story.title: Appreciate
story.content: Learn to appreciate emotional intelligence as well as intellectual intelligence.

story.title: People Like You
story.content: Virginia Woolf - Writer

story.title: People Like You
story.content: Charles Dickens - Writer

story.title: People Like You
story.content: Thomas Edison - Inventor

story.title: People Like You
story.content: Robbie Williams - Singer, songwriter
